items.sentence: I had more questions, but Tom seemed to be tired of my questions, so I didn\'t ask them.
Tom can\'t quite believe that Mary is really going on a date with him this Friday night.

Tears of joy streamed down Tom\'s face when he saw his baby daughter for the first time.
